do me a favor and visit this site for me and just check it out.
Order some free stickers & stuff while you're at it.

I think about these things all the time, I'm just putting them out here so people could let me know if they think the same.



1. why are the numbers 1,2,3,4,5,6,7, etc.,etc., called one-two-three-four-five-six-seven- and so forth? Who got to decide that big of a thing should be?

2. Why is blue,red,purple, etc., called blue, red and purple? I think they look more like George, Brianne, and Bill's, and same as up there, who got to decide this?
3. Who got to say 1+1=2? I think it should equal chair.

4.Why are we called girls, women, ladies, etc., and the guys called guys, or boys, or men. 


These are just some of the things I think about, and I also feel really strongly towards churches. How do we know what they are preaching to us is true? I mean don't get me wrong, maybe there is a god, but how do we know what they say about him is true, like that HE wants us to do all these things [referencing to the Ten Commandments.] and not just the church. But I guess that's a whole matter of belief, something I'm not prepared or interested to get in to. I don't go to church so don't take my opinion on how things work, I don't have a religion really.

Don't take offense to any of this, I'm not intending to offend, I'd just like to make a point.








Now.
You know who has REAL songs I mean songs that you can relate to, and aren't the same as every other song, besides My Chemical Romance and Panic! At the Disco?
Motion City Soundtrack.
Take for instance, this song:


"Where I Belong"

Hello there, how you doin'?
I've got all these thoughts just floating through my brain
They bump and they collide and cause a flurry of confusion
And it's getting on my nerves
I try to hold myself together
fighting off this mental weather when I can (sometimes I do)
But this shitstorm's never ending
And the atmospheric pressure's calling for rain

This is what I've got going on
This is where I belong tonight

It's chaos in the courthouse
And the left side's all upset
Because the right side wants a summer home
and knows we can't afford it
I try to mediate between
This constant tug-o-war machine
But wind up in a never ending game of telephone
There's so much going on
And I just need seven minutes to calm myself back down
Now I forgot where I was
Was it me we were talking about?
This is what I feared from the start
I keep falling apart

What's going on, is this where I belong tonight?
(What's going on tonight)
What's going on, is this where I belong tonight?
(What's going on)

(Can't stand) I can't stand the thought of losing
Sentences and every island of words
(Can't stand) I can't stand the thought of losing
Everything I ever thought I that I knew

This is where I run out of words
That describe how I'm so damn hurt
This is where I fumble and fold
And take what I'm told

What's going on, is this where I belong tonight?
(What's going on tonight)
What's going on, is this where I belong tonight?
(What's going on tonight)
What's going on, is this where I belong tonight?
(What's going on tonight)
What's going on, is this where I belong tonight?
(What's going on)

(Can't stand) I can't stand the thought of losing
Sentences and every island of words
(Can't stand) I can't stand the thought of losing
Everything I ever thought I that I knew



Wow I love this band. You should also listen to "Hello Helicopter" and "Autographs & Apologies"
or just any of their songs they are all so opinionated it makes me happy =]

Soo i slept over my friend Brittany's house yesterday.
It was fun. 
We went to Skateaway from 7-12 I saw a lot of people I knew [that I don't hate so much;]]
I had fun for once, but the whole ride there I was queasy on the whole account of anxiety.
Yes, I've come to the conclusion that I'm always anxious and always will be, same goes for nervousness.
But I found a better solution rather than biting my hands, writing songs I know the lyrics to, I mean it may affect my will to pay attention, but it works since I am able to sing the songs in my head.
There's this kid in my biology class who I'm attracted to, very attracted, maybe because he actually pays attention to me.
Although, there is a lot of kids I'm attracted to but I've decided only focus on the ones who are actually doing anything and acknowledging me.
I've noticed I haven't cursed, maybe this could work for me.
And about that person, at least this one has a MIND and an OPINION.

Today was really good day, which is unusual.
I mean the days are all pretty good but usually the same.
But today i felt more, ....I don't know, ME I guess.
I still feel really alone though.
But hey I'll get over it I guess.

It's been awhile since I've done this thing.
Nothings changed, I still remain opinionated,sick,bored, etc., etc.
I'm done with it.
all of it,
at least as of today.
I"m done caring, if there is something you need to say fucking say it.
Don't hold your tongue for me
Cause I"m sick of that.
I like hearing people's opinions it enhances my judgement.
And I sure as hell aren't going to talk to you first.
I need this ramble to make it through my week, pay no attention to the mixed up ideas and the fact that I've lost my train of thought a few words back.

I wasn't really planning to do these "entries" periodically, but hey, if it helps me understand myself, why not?
Again with the boredom[of my life that is]
part of me, no scratch that, ALL of me, is practically screaming out for something to look forward to. 
I'm listening to this song...
by motion city soundtrack on repeat, it's relating to how i feel sort of, not as good as another song they sing called "Let's get fucked up and die" but here's the lyrics:

"When You're Around"

Midwest love affair
I bend when I am bored
Late night liquor blue
Will lead me to the floor.
Can we fake it?
Can we make believe?
I'm so full of love
It deeply sickens me.

But all I could do was close my eyes
And cross my arms and hope to die
Cause you don't fucking listen
When I'm around.
The least you could do is take it back
All the vicious remarks and verbal attacks
Cause I can't fucking stand it.
When You're Around.

Midwest aftermath, the rumors start to rise
Did I truly do the things that you've described?
They must hate me, every single one
It just sickens them, what I consider fun.

But all I could do was close my eyes
And cross my arms and hope to die
Cause you don't fucking listen
When I'm around.
The least you could do is take it back
All the vicious remarks and verbal attacks,
Cause I can't fucking stand it.
When You're Around.

But all I could do was close my eyes
And cross my arms and hope to die
Cause you don't fucking listen
When I'm around.
The least you could do is take it back
All the vicious remarks and verbal attacks
Cause I can't fucking stand it.
When You're Around.

No I can't fucking stand it, when you're around.

No I can't fucking stand it, when you're around.

i suggest you give it a shot, it's amazing.
I'd hate to say what I want to for fear of if  the person reads it, but I'm so done with fear, fear just brings regret and those goddamn "what if" questions, i'm sick of "what if", who's with me?
I highly doubt anyone is, I don't know of a single person who shares what I think of at all, it's pretty depressing, knowing you're the only one.
Everyday I feel alone, more and more each day frankly, Even though I'm surrounded by people that I can "trust", friends, but... there's just something else, something undescribable,
I can't see it, though I have that feeling it's staring straight at me.

Whoa, I got off track, back to "that person", the last person i "fell" for.
I see him everyday, but I don't say a word, not even "hi".
Because he hates me.
I mean, my friend told me he "said" he didn't but how can I believe that?
He doesn't even acknowledge my existence.
Well, not counting the times I look over at him and he's looking my way.
But..
well..
forget it, it's unexplainable,
....
Is it wrong to say that i've lost most interest in basically everything besides writing, music, and my photography?
I've even lost interest in my friends, I mean, I love them, but nobody's changed.
Everything is the same, I love them the way they are, but everyone has somebody, if you catch my drift.
I don't.
I have no "other half" Fuck, I'm not even a real person if I'm only half, 
I guess it's another one of those "phase" things, a phase that's been going on since school let out last year.
I think my anxiety's getting stronger, I feel more sick everyday, I shake more even, the headaches are back too.
I know I don't need glasses, because my doctor told me my vision was "better than perfect".
I don't take pills for it, hopefully I never will have to, but that's because noone knows, my parents don't know how i feel, they don't know my sicknesses, but how can I tell them?
What kind of goddamn conversation would that be?
"How was school?"
"Institutionize me, I'm crazy"
?
that's not a particular conversation I'd look forward to.
I'm going to bed, hopefully a dream will unfuck me up.
that'd be nice.

okay...I've never done this so I don't exactly know who sees it but ehh who cares.

I'm sick to death.
of the world/people in it/ myself/ the life I'm "living".
Is it weird for me to wonder every single fucking day why people are the way they are?
I mean i don't get it.
I don't understand the world period
But this is the way we're supposed to "live" I guess.
unhappy, bored, and sick. 

Redundant or not, I'm SICK of being SICK.
Sickness sucks,
I need change, I'm sick of every day being THE SAME!
MAKE IT STOP!
it's fucking annoying.
day in day out same things go on, same words are said, same,same,same,SAME!
BORINGGGG!
I'm also sick of all the godamn people who think they even know me enough to care.
YOU DON'T STOP ACTING LIKE IT!
The people who the most they do is say hi to me or something,
nobody should know enough to care, because I haven't told them.
I'm the way I AM,You sure as hell aren't going to change that.
Today was color day, but since I have no school spirit I didn't really participate.
I did have warrior stripes, but i used them to color my hair pink^_^
I'm redoing my blue tips tomorrow if it's of any concern.
My cousin Laura is staying over, actually she's sleeping on the floor next to me.
I like her and all, but she needs and original idea in her head, she should stop stealing mine=/

She really pissed me off today though, I'll quote her "Gay People deserve a punch in their face"
So i said "Why?"
and she told me "Because that's just disgusting"
so i said
"It's not their fault."
and she said "Yeah it is"
And i said "NO. you can't help who you fall in love with!"
And she said "Yeah you can."
So i said "NO.you can't."
and she shut up. [for once]
what she doesn't realize is she just basically fucked with some of my heroes who happen to be bi/gay.
and some of my friends.
And you know what.. I'll laugh if like in 10 years I happen to call her, and her name's Bill.[let me know if you get that ;]]
I don't understand what the big deal about being gay/bi is?

so what.
the world MOVES ON!
IT DOESN'T AFFECT ANYTHING!
GROW THE FUCK UP!
